Title: Relates to restricting the public display of tobacco products and electronic cigarette advertisements and smoking paraphernalia near public libraries
Summary: Restricts the public display of tobacco products and electronic cigarette advertisements and smoking paraphernalia near public libraries.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the general business law, in relation to restricting the public display of tobacco products and electronic cigarette advertisements and smoking paraphernalia near public libraries
